text.value: Has noticed any changes in your symptoms over time?
For how long has been on these medications
Is having any other signs apart from the ones listed above?
For how many days has experienced these symptoms?
Educate on the benefits of sleeping under a mosquito net especially for children under the age of five then recommend they buy the nets
Recommend to visit a health facility
Is sleeping under a mosquito net?
What are the specific symptoms is experiencing? (fever, chills, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, etc.)
Recommend that get a treated mosquito net to help prevent malaria
Has sought any medical treatment for the symptoms?
Be sure you submit to complete this action
Follow up Task
Please recommend to health facility immediately
Follow up task will appear in 3 days

bind.relevant: selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms ,'fever') or selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms ,'vomiting') or selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms ,'diarrhoea') or selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms , 'fatigue') or selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms ,'loss_of_appetite') or selected( /household_member_assessment/group_household_member_assessment/symptoms ,'blood_in_stool')
